Texts.Eng: I just received new inventory from AAE, and I think you might like these new attachments. I'll let you see the new inventory if you can do a little something for me. I've heard talk about ^orange;Akkimari drones equipped with stealth tech^reset; - ^green;take down a few of them^reset;, and I'll open up the new inventory for you.
Well done, once again! Your fighting these drones teaches us at the Embassy a lot about this new threat, so you've more than earned access to these new weapon attachments.
